chapter.title: Starting and stopping the Evergreen services
chapter.para: This chapter tells you how to start and stop the Evergreen services.

section.title: Introduction
section.para: We may talk a bit about how Evergreen is built on OpenSRF and uses the OpenSRF control scripts. We could also talk a little bit about SysV init scripts (and the current lack thereof) and point to further documentation.

section.title: Starting the Evergreen services
section.para:
To start all of the Evergreen services on a given server, issue the following command as the opensrf user:
osrf_ctl.sh -a start_all
